amendment.description: To commend the leadership and people of Columbia on the third anniversary of Plan Columbia.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1194 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1194 proposed by Senator Lugar for Senator Frist to Amendment SA 1136. (consideration: CR S9203-9205; text: CR S9203-9204) To commend the leadership and people of Columbia on the third anniversary of Plan Columbia.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1194 proposed by Senator Lugar for Senator Frist to Amendment SA 1136.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1194 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
